newsitem.title: USA: Atmos says Stephens, Purser resign from board.
newsitem.headline: Atmos says Stephens, Purser resign from board.

text.p: Atmos Energy Corp said Friday that Robert Stephens and James Purser have resigned from the company's board of directors, severing all relationship with the company.
The company announced in March that Stephens had resigned as president and chief operating officer, and Purser had resigned as executive vice president and chief financial officer.
Atmos said both men left to pursue other opportunites.
Atmos Energy provides natural gas service to more than 680,000 customers in Texas, Colorado, Kansas, Missouri, Louisiana and Kentucky.
